subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Immigration, Iraq war dominate Georgia special election

06/19/07 09:23 PM, EDT
Voters in Georgia's 10th Congressional District went to the polls Tuesday. At stake is Charlie Norwood's old congressional seat representing the northeastern part of the state. The longtime Republican congressman died in February of lung disease and cancer.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: My Custom Alert
'Teach For America' strives for educational equality

06/19/07 09:07 PM, EDT
This year, 18,000 of America's top college graduates competed for spots teaching in some of the poorest areas of the United States.
